title: (2)(c) of section 6 of the Affordable Housing Act 2021 (No.25 of 2021) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Affordable Housing Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Affordable Housing Act 2021 

(Commencement of Section 6(2)(c)) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited affordable housing act 2021 (commencement section 6(2)(c)) order 2022

title: (2)(c) of section 6 of the Affordable Housing Act 2021 (No.25 of 2021) shall
heading: 2. The 28th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which subsection
text_raw:
2. The 28th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which subsection 
(2)(c) of section 6 of the Affordable Housing Act 2021 (No.25 of 2021) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 July, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [408] 3
